IrisViewer class¶

class iris.viewer.IrisViewer(config_file_name='config.orb', no_log=True, debug=False)¶

Bases: orb.visual.BaseViewer

Iris Viewer class.

_camera_changed_cb(c)¶

camera-changed-callback.

Called when a new camera to display is choosen.

Parameters:c – Caller instance.
_get_plugins()¶

Create plugins to add to the base viewer.

_get_selected_stat(c)¶

stat-selection-callback.

Parameters:c – Caller instance.
_set_image_index_cb(c)¶

set-image-index-callback.

Called when a new image index is choosen.

Parameters:c – Caller instance.
_start_listener_daemon(daemon_port=9000)¶

Launch a socket listener daemon to enable communication with the viewer from external processes.

Parameters:daemon_port – Listening port of the daemon.

Note

If nescessary the listener may be stopped by sending the message ‘stop’, e.g.:

import socket
s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET,
                  socket.SOCK_STREAM)
s.connect((socket.gethostname(), port))
s.send('stop'.encode('ascii'))
s.close()
_update_iris_cb(c)¶

update-callback Reload data cube.

Parameters:c – Caller instance.
update_all_stats()¶

Load all the statistics of all the frames.

update_stats_store()¶

Update displayed statistics.
